caption:
Table 1: Ablation experiments of network structures on S3DIS Area-5. SEDS: 
semantic edge detection stream; EFE: enhanced feature extraction; HS: hierar-
chical supervision; SSS: semantic segmentation stream; JRM: joint refinement 
module. The results in some cells (with '-') are not available, since the corre-
sponding models perform either SS or SED.
